mapper.select: /* 평가정보 */ SELECT BASE_DATE AS BASE_DATE , TO_CHAR(TOT_BUY_AMT, 'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOT_BUY_AMT , TO_CHAR(TOT_EST_AMT, 'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOT_EST_AMT , NVL(( SELECT TRD_EXCH_RATE FROM ADEXRT WHERE BASE_DATE = FUNC_GET_MAX('ADEXRT') AND CUR_C = 'USD' ), 0) AS EXRT_RATE , TO_CHAR(FUNC_RN(YIELD , 3) * 100 , 'FM990.90') || '%' AS YIELD FROM ADESTM WHERE BASE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(EE.BASE_DATE) FROM ADESTM EE)

/* 종목정보 */ SELECT B.BASE_DATE AS BASE_DATE , B.STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C , I.ITEM_SHORT AS ITEM_SHORT , FUNC_RN((B.BUY_AMT * B.QUANTITY) , 2) AS BUY_AMT , FUNC_RN((B.EST_AMT * B.QUANTITY) , 2) AS EST_AMT FROM ADBASE B , ADITEM I WHERE B.BASE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(BB.BASE_DATE) FROM ADBASE BB) AND B.STND_ITEM_C = I.STND_ITEM_C ORDER BY I.ITEM_SHORT

/* 총 잔고금액(차트) */ SELECT FUNC_CONV_DATE(BASE_MONTH, '-', 'B') AS BASE_MONTH , FUNC_RN(TOT_AMT/1000, 0) AS TOT_AMT , FUNC_RN(TOT_ESTM_AMT /1000, 0) AS TOT_ESTM_AMT , FUNC_RN((TOT_ESTM_AMT - TOT_AMT) / TOT_ESTM_AMT * 100, 2) AS YIELD FROM ( SELECT S.BASE_MONTH AS BASE_MONTH , FUNC_GET_EXRT(FUNC_GET_BUSI_DAY(FUNC_GET_MAX('ADBASE'), 'B'), 'USD', S.TOT_AMT) + P.TOT_AMT AS TOT_AMT , FUNC_GET_EXRT(FUNC_GET_BUSI_DAY(FUNC_GET_MAX('ADBASE'), 'B'), 'USD', S.TOT_ESTM_AMT) + P.TOT_ESTM_AMT AS TOT_ESTM_AMT FROM ( SELECT BASE_MONTH AS BASE_MONTH , SUM(B.TOT_AMT) AS TOT_AMT , SUM(B.TOT_ESTM_AMT) AS TOT_ESTM_AMT FROM ADBSRT B , ADITEM I WHERE B.STND_ITEM_C = I.STND_ITEM_C AND I.ASTS_GD_TC IN ('S', 'E') GROUP BY BASE_MONTH ORDER BY BASE_MONTH ) S, ( SELECT BASE_MONTH AS BASE_MONTH , SUM(B.TOT_AMT) AS TOT_AMT , SUM(B.TOT_ESTM_AMT) AS TOT_ESTM_AMT FROM ADBSRT B , ADITEM I WHERE B.STND_ITEM_C = I.STND_ITEM_C AND I.ASTS_GD_TC IN ('P', 'R') GROUP BY BASE_MONTH ORDER BY BASE_MONTH ) P WHERE S.BASE_MONTH = P.BASE_MONTH AND S.BASE_MONTH >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3), 'YYYYMMDD') ) ORDER BY FUNC_CONV_DATE(BASE_MONTH, '-', 'B')

/* 종목비율(차트) */ SELECT B.BASE_MONTH AS BASE_MONTH , B.STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C , I.ITEM_SHORT AS ITEM_SHORT , FUNC_RN(B.ESTM_RATIO, 3) * 100 AS ESTM_RATIO FROM ADBSRT B , ADITEM I WHERE B.BASE_MONTH = (SELECT MAX(BB.BASE_MONTH) FROM ADBSRT BB) AND B.STND_ITEM_C = I.STND_ITEM_C AND I.ASTS_GD_TC IN ('S', 'E')

/* 펀드비율(차트) */ SELECT B.BASE_MONTH AS BASE_MONTH , B.STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C , I.ITEM_SHORT AS ITEM_SHORT , FUNC_RN(B.ESTM_RATIO, 3) * 100 AS ESTM_RATIO FROM ADBSRT B , ADITEM I WHERE B.BASE_MONTH = (SELECT MAX(BB.BASE_MONTH) FROM ADBSRT BB) AND B.STND_ITEM_C = I.STND_ITEM_C AND I.ASTS_GD_TC IN ('P', 'R')

/* 보유종목 상세정보 */ WITH ITEMLIST AS ( SELECT B.BASE_DATE AS BASE_DATE , B.STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C , I.ITEM_SHORT AS ITEM_SHORT , FUNC_GET_EXRT(B.BASE_DATE, 'USD', FUNC_RN(B.BUY_AMT * QUANTITY, 2)) AS BUY_AMT , FUNC_GET_EXRT(B.BASE_DATE, 'USD', FUNC_RN(B.EST_AMT * QUANTITY, 2)) AS EST_AMT FROM ADITEM I , ADBASE B WHERE I.STND_ITEM_C = B.STND_ITEM_C AND B.BASE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(BB.BASE_DATE) FROM ADBASE BB) UNION ALL SELECT F.BASE_DATE AS BASE_DATE , F.STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C , I.ITEM_SHORT AS ITEM_SHORT , F.TOT_BUY_AMT AS BUY_AMT , F.TOT_EST_AMT AS EST_AMT FROM ADITEM I , ADFUND F WHERE I.STND_ITEM_C = F.STND_ITEM_C AND F.BASE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(FF.BASE_DATE) FROM ADFUND FF) ) SELECT FUNC_CONV_DATE(BASE_DATE, '-') AS BASE_DATE , STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C , ITEM_SHORT AS ITEM_SHORT , TO_CHAR(BUY_AMT, 'FM999,999,999,999') AS BUY_AMT , TO_CHAR(EST_AMT, 'FM999,999,999,999') AS EST_AMT , TO_CHAR(((EST_AMT - BUY_AMT) / BUY_AMT) * 100, 'FM990.90') || '%' AS YIELD FROM ITEMLIST
/* 가격정보 조회 */ SELECT BASE_DATE AS BASE_DATE , STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C , PRICE AS PRICE , CUR_C AS CUR_C FROM ADPRIF WHERE BASE_DATE = #{BASE_DATE}

/* 거래정보 리스트 조회 */ SELECT TR_DATE AS TR_DATE , STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C , ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME , TR_PRICE AS TR_PRICE , TR_QUANTITY AS TR_QUANTITY , TR_COST AS TR_COST , F_TR_COST AS F_TR_COST , TR_AMT AS TR_AMT , F_TR_AMT AS F_TR_AMT FROM ADTRIS WHERE TR_DATE = #{TR_DATE} AND STND_ITEM_C = #{STND_ITEM_C}
/* 종목정보 리스트 조회 */ SELECT STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C , ITEM_SHORT AS ITEM_SHORT FROM ADITEM WHERE ASTS_GD_TC IN ('S', 'E')
/* 펀드정보 리스트 조회 */ SELECT STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C , ITEM_SHORT AS ITEM_SHORT FROM ADITEM WHERE ASTS_GD_TC IN ('P', 'R')
/* 공통코드(환율코드) 조회 */ SELECT TRIM(CODE) AS curC FROM ADCDDE WHERE CODE_ID = 'CUR_C' AND CODE != 'KRW'
/* 잔고 가격 대상 조회 */ SELECT STND_ITEM_C AS stndItemC , CUR_C AS curC FROM ADITEM WHERE ASTS_GD_TC IN ('S', 'E')
/* 펀드 가격 대상 조회 */ SELECT STND_ITEM_C AS stndItemC , CUR_C AS curC FROM ADITEM WHERE ASTS_GD_TC = 'R'
/* 펀드 체크 */ SELECT STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C FROM ADFUND WHERE BASE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(BASE_DATE) FROM ADFUND WHERE BASE_DATE <= #{BASE_DATE})
/* 비율 체크 */ SELECT STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C FROM ADBSRT WHERE BASE_MONTH = SUBSTR(#{BASE_DATE}, 0, 6)

/* 공통 체크 */ SELECT I.STND_ITEM_C AS STND_ITEM_C FROM ADITEM I , ADPRIF P , ADEXRT E WHERE P.STND_ITEM_C = I.STND_ITEM_C AND P.BASE_DATE = #{BASE_DATE} AND P.BASE_DATE = E.BASE_DATE AND I.CUR_C = E.CUR_C AND I.ASTS_GD_TC IN ('S', 'E')
mapper.insert: /* 배치 이력 */ INSERT INTO ADBAIF ( BATCH_ID , BATCH_PROC_TIME , BATCH_STATUS , LST_CHNG_NAME , LST_CHNG_TIME ) VALUES ( (SELECT FUNC_GET_RMKS('BATCH_ID', #{BATCH_ID}) FROM DUAL) , CURRENT_DATE , FUNC_FIND_CDNM('BATCH_STATUS', #{BATCH_STATUS}) , 'ADE' , CURRENT_DATE )
/* 잔여 데이터 삭제 */ {CALL ADMIN.PROC_DELETE_ALL(#{BASE_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR})}
